2008650.name: Marpi OS
2008650.description:
An endless experimental artwork in a form of a digital art screensaver. This procedurally generated project is inspired by a mix of imaginary robotics, and abstract, alien like arachnids, crustaceans and insects. Originally a site-specific interactive art installation, now coming to Steam as an audio-visual experience.

It's an experiment in randomness, mixing user input, pseudo random function generators, Perlin noise, Brownian motion, Voronoi patterns and realtime sound synthesizers, bringing you an infinite variation of moving shapes, sounds and colors.

Latest updates:

  • Featuring 5 full audio-visual scenes

  • New interface for browsing the generative variations

  • Visuals and sounds now are connected together

  • Introducing IDs for saving and sharing specific combinations

  • Updated audio reactive mode - now supporting system audio and microphone inputs

  • Auto-saving state of each scene

  • Simplified visual settings

  • And many more performance and usability fixes
